name: Telescope Words A-Z Quiz Series - S Part 1 | Brain Teasers | 25 Questions

questions.text:
Each question will consist of three or more clues. For instance, the three clues might read "Beverage - Hockey arena - Pen fluid". You must come up with these answers. The first answer is the longest word, the second answer will drop the first letter of the first answer, and the same thing happens to find the third word. In this case, the answers would be "Drink - Rink - Ink". I want you to type in ONLY the longest word, so in this example, you would type in "Drink". Each answer in this quiz will begin with the letter S.

White powder used as food - In the past - Move forward; leave
Rascal - Place where people live in tents - Quantity of electricity flowing in current
Land area; scenery - Long cloak - Gorilla
Frighten - Tend - To be
Speak angrily - Frigid - Aged
Small soft cake - Fruit of a pine tree - Single
Grade - Apple center - Mining rock
Go away! - Quick study session before test - Male sheep
Loud cry - Fatty part of milk - 500 sheets of paper
Not deep - Bless - Let
To cut wool off a sheep - Listen - Organ of listening
Bundles of corn - Pulls hard - Edge of roof
British county - Employ - Anger
questions.explanation:
Shire.

	Shire (WorcesterSHIRE, NottinghamSHIRE, etc.) - Hire - Ire

questions.text: Ability - Murder - Sick

Collapse - Mass - Baseball referee
Intelligent - Grocery store - Paintings, sculptures, etc.
White flakes from sky - At this moment - Ouch!
Solar system - Step - One card
Cut - Small white insects that live in hair - Frozen water
questions.explanation:
Slice.

	Slice - Lice (plural of louse) - Ice

questions.text: Little flash of fire - Put car in lot - _ of the Covenant

Using money - Awaiting - Stopping

Spending.

questions.text: Turn around and around - Button that attaches with metal stick - Not out
